name: Neko Hacker Plus
description:
Gameplay

You miraculously slip into the room of your friend, who works as a photographer. While she is busy, you have time to hack the images on her computer!
Discover all the pictures by solving simple puzzles of the ChanOS system!

In the process of exploring a friend's room, you can do the available activities. For example, change clothes, modify your body look, watch the cats or just dance.
